group_1.textRight: Rabi, you sure it's okay to let the professor and@Nayuta go home?
If we're gonna be talking about what happens next@we shoulda had them stay.

group_1.textLeft: Because we're not talking about what's next,@we're talking about you.
Yes, I wanted to ask if you've drawn the line.

group_1.textRight: Well... Actually I uh, still don't really get what that@means...

group_1.textLeft: I see...

group_1.textRight: I heard what was going on from Rabi.
Did you get to say goodbye to the Three Sisters of@Promised Blood?

group_1.textLeft: There was a fight going on right then, so I didn't@really get to...

group_1.textRight: It is fine if you've come to accept it, however...

group_1.textLeft: You say that, Asahi, but how about you?

group_1.textRight: I revealed my identity to all of the head family.
Furthermore, I said my farewells to the Tokime Clan.
I also told Hime who I really am@and told her goodbye.

group_1.textLeft: In that case, I...
...Yuna found out who I was, making it all awkward...
So I didn't get to say goodbye.
As I thought...

group_1.textRight: Drawing the line - does that mean saying goodbye@to Yuna and everyone...
And getting rid of this feeling of uncertainty?

group_1.textLeft: I do not have an answer to that question.
The only one who can produce an answer is you,@Urara.

group_1.textRight: Ughh...you and your riddles...
Hm...
It's a message from a Promised Blood girl...
You are still receiving messages from them?

group_1.textLeft: Ah, yeah...because I didn't tell her I left@Promised Blood...
But the way things are, I shouldn't be accepting@messages.
.....[wait:1.0][chara:103600:cheek_0][chara:103600:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json][chara:103600:lipSynch_1]Eh?
T-this is bad...!

group_1.textRight: What's wrong?

group_1.textLeft: She says that to decide on the group's policy,
Yuna and Juri are gonna duel!

group_1.textRight: Eh - did Promised Blood not decide...
...that they would join the Union...?

group_1.textLeft: They were supposed to...!
But some girls were opposed to Yuna's desire to@cooperate with the Union,
so it wasn't monolithic...
Perhaps Juri Ooba intends to gather the opposing@force and kill Yuna Kureha...
(If Yuna and Juri really do go all out...)
(Neither of them'll be safe...)
(And once again, someone will lose their life...!)

group_1.textRight: ...Does it worry you?

group_1.textLeft: I just don't want another Magical Girl losin'@their life...

group_1.textRight: That cannot be the only reason.

group_1.textLeft: If you're concerned, then you may go to Futatsugi.

group_1.textRight: But I already decided I'm not seein' them anymore...!

group_1.textLeft: Then you intend on carrying unresolved regrets for@those girls...?

group_1.textRight: Ughh.....
(I'm worried about everyone in Promised Blood...)
(I can't deny this feeling anymore...)
(So then, I will...)
If getting rid of any regrets I have about everyone@in Promised Blood...
...is what you mean by drawing the line...
...Then I'm going.@Just this once, back to Futatsugi...
